description: Manage private link resource of an Azure Arc-Enabled Server.

commands.name: az connectedmachine private-link-resource list
commands.summary: List the private link resources that need to be created for an Azure Monitor PrivateLinkScope.
examples: az connectedmachine private-link-resource list --resource-group myResourceGroup --scope-name myPrivateLinkScope

commands.name: az connectedmachine private-link-resource show
commands.summary: Get the private link resources that need to be created for an Azure Monitor PrivateLinkScope.
examples: az connectedmachine private-link-resource show --group-name hybridcompute --resource-group myResourceGroup --scope-name myPrivateLinkScope
